Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Provides that microbusinesses in New York are eligible for small business revolving loans and the linked deposit interest rate reductions
Summary: Provides that microbusinesses in New York are eligible for small business revolving loans and the linked deposit interest rate reductions.
LawCode: Add ยง131-a, Ec Dev L; amd ยง213, St Fin L; amd ยง16-t, UDC Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, the state finance law and the New York state urban development corporation act, in relation to making small business loans available to microbusinesses
